textList.text: While Pavonians themselves do not concern themselves with galactic war, their worlds are still far from peaceful. A pirate ship terrorizing civilians in this system, decided to make a move against you.
The Pavonian space can be dangerous as pirates are allowed to roam and loot ships with impunity. One of those pirates is moving towards you with weapons armed.

event.name: PAVONIAN_REBEL_FIGHT
event.text: A Rebel ship is stationed at the beacon. "We are bringing order into this system. All incoming ships are to be inspected. Those who oppose, are to be destroyed." There is no way around a fight.

event.name: PAVONIAN_PIRATE_ASTEROID
event.text: As you complete the maneuver, you realize that the beacon is located inside the dense asteroid field. A pirate ship, skillfully dodging asteroids, awaits someone to loot: "These are not rainbow aliens." "Doesn't matter, kill them anyway."

event.name: PAVONIAN_PIRATE_SUN
event.text: This beacon is located far from common Pavonian systems, right near a supergiant star. A pirate ship, barely able to withstand the radiating energy, attacks!
